title: *SPOILERS* - Person Of Interest - HR Storyline Tribute
author: solyentbrak1
comment: HOLY SHIT. You are a genius, my friend! Make more of these! The Machine, Man in the Suit, I don't care! Send this to the producers, damn it! My god, this is SO GOOD.

This is really good! The footage, the quotes, the sound editing... Great job! I do agree with waldomarek. The quality isn't great, and I have to admit that I had to watch it twice because I was skipping around the first time, not expecting much of it. But as I said... this video is awesome.

Amazing video, you're so smart!
HR had a very important part in the show..Story, characters, actors..they were all great!
description:
ONLY WATCH IF YOU ARE UP TO DATE WITH THE SHOW!

Since the big conclusion to the HR storyline a few weeks back iv been wanting to make a sort of trailer version tribute / recap, and when I heard this cover of Heart Of Gold I thought it would be perfect to combine the two! As always enjoy and comments!
